originalText.text:
I had Botox for the second time so I was still a little nervous as my first time was a little difficult for me.  But Karina was great.  She kept me calm and went slowly.  I felt really comfortable and I look great.  I will definitely see Karina again for Botox, but am also thinking of getting chin fill from her as well.
Also, the staff were all wonderful and the office is beautiful.  I highly recommend going to Specialty Aesthetic Surgery.

originalText.text: I had the most wonderful experience today! As soon as I walked in, the staff was so warm and welcoming. Everyone was so professional & organized. Staff made me feel super comfortable from beginning to end of visit. I came in after winning a giveaway & wasn‚Äôt quite sure what to expect or where I was going to get filler. Luckily Dr. Frants, assessed my face with the utmost precision & I truly valued her professionalism & most importantly her honesty. Most doctors will inject you just because but that wasn‚Äôt the case with Dr. Frants. She took her time in examining my face & figuring out what would be the best option for me. We decided to go with cheek filler. It was quick, easy and super painless . Thank you Specialty Aesthetics for such an incredible experience ! Definitely 5 out of 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è for me üíñ

originalText.text: My experience with Dr. Bruce and the entire Specialty Aesthetic team was a pleasure from start to finish.  I was made to feel comfortable from my first consultation, through my surgery and in post operative visits.  Not only did he solve my dermatologic problems on my eyelids, but the cosmetic surgery has made me feel more confident and happy with my appearance.  Everyone on staff is positive and upbeat, and the entire experience was wonderful.  I can't speak highly enough about Dr. Bruce and everyone at Specialty Aesthetic, and will recommend them to anyone in need of these services.  Thank you so much!

originalText.text:
I am truly grateful for the exceptional care and transformative work provided by these two remarkable plastic surgeons. Not only have they enhanced my physical appearance, but they have also restored my confidence and sense of self-worth in ways I never thought possible. Their remarkable talents and expertise are evident in the stunning results they achieved. The warmth and dedication of their office staff further enriched my experience, as they anticipated and met every need with genuine care. I wholeheartedly recommend these gifted doctors to anyone seeking not just a change in appearance, but a profound positive shift in their life.
Mara LaViola

originalText.text: So I called the office for a last minute appointment and spoke with Antonella. She was a gem, she was so accommodating and professional, I was able to be seen same day. When I arrived to the office, receptionist Lindsey was so welcoming, and my provider Karina saw me quickly and made me feel so comfortable. She educated me through every step of the way, definitely will be back and hope this review gives you the sign you need to check this place out!
